title: FluidsProgram
description: Description of the fluids program design

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

FluidIntervals.title: Fluid Intervals
FluidIntervals.description: An array of fluid intervals that in turn describe the target fluid properties that should be implemented

items.title: Fluids Interval
items.description: A fluid used in the drilling of a wellbore's section

IntervalName.title: Interval Name
IntervalName.description: The name of an interval in which the fluid will be used

IntervalTopMeasuredDepth.title: Interval Top Measured Depth
IntervalTopMeasuredDepth.description: The top measured depth of the interval in which the fluid will be used (in many cases, this Measured Depth will be the same than the one provided by WellboreArchitecture.HoleSection content). Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

IntervalBaseMeasuredDepth.title: Interval Base Measured Depth
IntervalBaseMeasuredDepth.description: The bottom measured depth of the interval in which the fluid will be used (in many cases, this Measured Depth will be the same than the one provided by WellboreArchitecture.HoleSection content). Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

HoleSectionID.title: Hole Section ID
HoleSectionID.description: Description of the Hole Section for this Fluids Program

InstalledTubularAssemblyID.title: Installed Tubular Assembly ID
InstalledTubularAssemblyID.description: The identifier of the tubular to be installed.

FluidTypeID.title: Fluid Type ID
FluidTypeID.description: A fixed list of reference values describing the high level type of the drilling fluid

LabReferenceNumber.title: Lab Reference Number
LabReferenceNumber.description: A reference number allowing traceability back to the analysis of the fluid in a lab

FluidsSystem.title: Fluid System
FluidsSystem.description: Provides the overall description of the drilling fluids system.

FluidSystemName.title: Fluid System Name
FluidSystemName.description: Free text string of the common name or product name of the drilling mud.

FluidPurposeID.title: Fluid Purpose ID
FluidPurposeID.description: The purpose the mud will play in this hole section (can be Sweep, Displacement Mud).

FluidProperties.title: Fluid Properties
FluidProperties.description: An array of planned / designed properties of the fluid for the Interval / Phase. Properties may have a specified value or a range that should be maintained

items.title: Fluids Property
items.description: A description of fluid used in the drilling of a wellbore

FluidPropertyNameID.title: Fluid Property Name
FluidPropertyNameID.description: An open reference list of fluid properties

FluidFacets.title: Fluid Facets
FluidFacets.description: Array of Fluids facet that describes each individual programmed property of the fluids.

items.title: Fluid Facet
items.description: A description of an individual facet composing a fluid

FluidPropertyFacetNameID.title: Fluid Property Type Facet Name ID
FluidPropertyFacetNameID.description: Identifier to the list of potential types of Fluid Property Facet (e.g. Measured, Range (Min), Range (Max)

FluidPropertyValue.title: Fluid Property Value
FluidPropertyValue.description: The actual value of the property

FluidPropertyUnit.title: Fluid Property Unit
FluidPropertyUnit.description: The measurement unit of the Fluid Property Value

MeasuredPropertyID.title: Measured Property Identifier
MeasuredPropertyID.description: The unique identifier of the fluid property (density or temperature measurement,….)

BarrelFormulation.title: Barrel Formulation
BarrelFormulation.description: Description of the formulation to be used for the drilling activity

items.title: Barrel Formulation
items.description: Description of the formulation of the barrel that will be part of the drilling mud

ConcentrationValue.title: Concentration Value
ConcentrationValue.description: The actual value of the planned product concentration

ConcentrationUnitOfMeasure.title: Concentration Value Unit of Measure
ConcentrationUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure of the planned product concentration

Quantity.title: Quantity
Quantity.description: The actual number of units of the component. The unit size of the component. For example if you wanted to use 15 x 25 lb bags then the Unit would be lbs, the UnitSize would be 25 and the Product Package would be "Bag" and the Quantity would be 15

ProductUnitOfMeasure.title: Product Unit Of Measure
ProductUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit size of the component. For example if this product came in 25 lb bags then the Unit would be lbs, the UnitSize would be 25 and the Product Package would be "Bag"

ProductUnitSize.title: Product Unit Size
ProductUnitSize.description: The unit size of the component. For example if this product came in 25 lb bags then the Unit would be lbs, the UnitSize would be 25 and the Product Package would be "Bag"

ProductCode.title: Product Code
ProductCode.description: The code associated with the product

ProductFunction.title: Product Function
ProductFunction.description: The function that the component plays in the formulation. For example Base Oil, Fresh Water, Chemical Additive

ProductPackage.title: Product Package
ProductPackage.description: The packaging that the component comes in. For example Sacks, Bags. For Liquids this is usually N/A

ProductSg.title: Product Specific Gravity
ProductSg.description: The specific gravity value of the component.

PolymerType.title: Polymer Type
PolymerType.description: Type of polymers present in mud system.

FluidsSupplierID.title: Fluids Supplier ID
FluidsSupplierID.description: Identifier of the fluids supplier company
